code: import axios from"axios";import API from"./API";export default function CallApi(){var method=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"GET";var endpoint=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var item=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;return axios({method:method,url:"".concat(API,"/").concat(endpoint),data:item});}
